Title: Ders Comes in Handy
Writer: Ryan Koh, Blake Anderson (creator), Adam Devine (creator), Anders Holm (creator), Kyle Newacheck (creator), Connor Pritchard (creator), Dominic Russo (creator), Bill Krebs (staff writer)
Actors: Blake Anderson, Adam Devine, Anders Holm, Jillian Bell
Plot: When Montez suspects his wife is cheating on him, the guys help him find the culprit.
